game.name: Train Simulator: 15th Anniversary Scenario Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Celebrate the 15th Anniversary of Train Simulator with this special scenario pack. This pack includes 15 new scenarios and three iconic locomotives.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Celebrate the 15th Anniversary of Train Simulator with this special scenario pack. This pack includes 15 new scenarios and three iconic locomotives.
